checkersgame.Model

Class SaveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • checkersgame.Model.Database
      • checkersgame.Model.SaveManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoveController, ReplayMenuController

    public abstract class SaveManager
extends Database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SaveManager()
      Creates a new SaveController for communicating with the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected MovesQueue getMoves(int replayID)
      Get a moves queue from from the database contain all the moves for the specified replay.

      Return the move replay data from the given replay ID in a raw ResultSet format

      Gets the list of all stored replays.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SaveManager

        public SaveManager()
        Creates a new SaveController for communicating with the database. Establishes a new connection with the database
        See Also:
        Database

    • Method Detail

      • save

        protected void save(Move move)
        Saves the current move to the database. If there is no replay associated with the move, a new replay will be created.
        Parameters:
        move - The move to be saved.

      • getReplaysList

        protected java.sql.ResultSet getReplaysList()
        Gets the list of all stored replays.
        Returns:
        ResultSet of replays

      • getReplay

        protected java.sql.ResultSet getReplay(int replayID)
        Return the move replay data from the given replay ID in a raw ResultSet format
        Parameters:
        replayID - ID of the replay in the replay table
        Returns:
        ResultSet of moves for the replay

      • getMoves

        protected MovesQueue getMoves(int replayID)
        Get a moves queue from from the database contain all the moves for the specified replay. Converts the resultSet from getReplay to a MovesQueue.
        Parameters:
        replayID - ID of the replay in the replay table
        Returns:
        MovesQueue queue
        See Also:
        MovesQueue
